title: Implement Tool Management API Endpoints
description:
Create the backend API endpoints for tool management operations.

Files to modify:
- backend/src/modules/tools/tools.module.ts (new)
- backend/src/modules/tools/tools.controller.ts (new)
- backend/src/modules/tools/tools.service.ts (new)
- backend/src/modules/tools/dto/create-tool.dto.ts (new)
- backend/src/modules/tools/dto/update-tool.dto.ts (new)

Changes needed:
1. Create DTOs for tool creation and updates
2. Implement service methods for:
   - Creating tools (with image search)
   - Updating tools
   - Deleting tools
   - Listing user's tools
3. Create controller endpoints:
   - POST /api/tools
   - PUT /api/tools/:id
   - DELETE /api/tools/:id
   - GET /api/tools/my-tools
4. Add proper validation and error handling

Testing:
- Test all CRUD operations via e2e tests
- Verify owner-only access to update/delete
- Test validation error cases

Acceptance Criteria:
- Supports AC01, AC03 (tool creation)
- Supports AC04 (listing tools)
- Supports AC05 (editing tools)
- Supports AC06 (deleting tools)
